headline.main: 127 Midget Ships Are Added to Program To Meet Shortage in Cargo Vessels

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 21 -- Confronted with an immediate shortage of merchant shipping, pending delivery of mass tonnage of Liberty ships and other cargo vessels now on the ways, the United States Maritime Commission announced today that it plans to build 127 smaller special-type vessels which can be constructed without interfering with the larger shipbuilding program.
